# normalizedPositionDidChange()

**Instance Method**

Notifies the cell when its normalized position changes.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func normalizedPositionDidChange()
```

## Discussion

## Managing Cell Position

- **normalizedPositionWillChange(_:)**: Notifies the cell when its normalized position is about to change.
